HeroSection.title: Your digital recipe book
HeroSection.description: Store, organize, and easily find all your favorite recipes in one place. Now available for Android!

FeaturesSection.title: Main Features
FeaturesSection.feature1_description: Information stored on your device, no internet needed.
FeaturesSection.feature2_description: View, add, and delete recipes with instructions and ingredients always at hand.
FeaturesSection.feature3_description: Dark theme ideal for cooking in low-light environments.
FeaturesSection.feature4_description: Soon you'll be able to share your culinary creations with friends and family.
FeaturesSection.feature5_description: Automatic recipe generation from images using AI.
FeaturesSection.feature6_description: The app is available in multiple languages to cater to a global audience.

CTASection.title: Available now!
CTASection.description: The Recipes App is now available for Android. Download the app and start organizing your favorite recipes today.
